headline: Looking For Yields: Microchip Technology, Comcast, And Getty Realty Are Consistent Moneymakers
summary: Companies with a long history of paying dividends and consistently hiking them remain appealing to income-focused investors. Microchip Technology, Comcast, and Getty Realty have rewarded shareholders for years and recently announced dividend increases. These companies currently offer dividend yields of up to 6%. Microchip Technology Microchip Technology (NASDAQ:MCHP) engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of smart, connected, and secure embedded control solutions in the Americas, Euro
